snippet.title: MAGICAL BAKERY LAUNCH TRAILER - Cozy Cooking Video Game
snippet.description:
#cozygame  #magicalbakery  #cozygames 
Magical Bakery is now available on Epic, Nintendo Switch, PS5, Steam, and Xbox Series X|S!
Magical Bakery is a cozy, cooking and management game where you get to run your own enchanted bakery! As a young magical baker trainee, your goal is to create a warm, welcoming bakery filled with delicious treats while completing your exams to become the best in town. Get ready to bake, serve, and add a touch of magic to every creation!

00:00 - Intro
00:26 - There is a little wizard
00:53 - Bake, keep customers happy, upgrade
01:12 - Sweetness and magic together!
01:33 - Have the best magical bakery
01:45 - Magical Bakery is OUT NOW

Follow SOEDESCO®!
Discord: https://discord.gg/soedesco
Website: http://www.soedesco.com/
Newsletter: https://bit.ly/2wsfR4f
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Soedesco
Twitter: https://twitter.com/soedesco
Instagram: https://instagram.com/soedesco

Video editors: 
@DanielFigaresYT 
@juanfranrivero

About SOEDESCO:
SOEDESCO is an independent video game developer, publisher, and distributor founded in 2002 by Soedesh Chauthi with its headquarters in Rotterdam, the Netherlands, and offices in Madrid, Spain & Pilsen, Czech Republic. We deliver creative content across multiple genres and platforms for a worldwide audience in physical and digital formats.
